creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: heavily starched indigo with applied horizontal scroll embroidery; center bands and borders separated by narrow blue and green ribbon; Colors of embroidery: green and blue with occasional orange on shades of brown silk; border band of ribbon hand stitching and scroll embroidery
title: Baby Carrier
